author: Connell Smith
title: COVID-19 causes concerns for construction workers
description: John Landry, executive director of the Construction Association of New Brunswick estimates about 15 per cent of his member companies so far have shut down their operations temporarily.
content:
People in New Brunswick's construction industry are watching developments in the COVID-19 crisis with growing alarm.
